constraints.name: xor_subarray_sum_constraint
constraints.description: 长度为2的子串的异或和均为1（VS 串定义）

constraints.name: interval_operation_constraint
constraints.description: 区间操作，包括填充0、填充1、取反

constraints.name: subsequence_constraint
constraints.description: 查询区间内长度为k的子串中满足特定条件（VS 串）的数量

constraints.name: longest_increasing_subsequence_constraint
constraints.description: 查询区间内最长的满足特定条件（VS 串）的子串长度

constraints.name: xor_subarray_sum_constraint
constraints.description: 长度为2的子串的异或和均为1（VS 串定义）

constraints.name: interval_operation_constraint
constraints.description: 区间操作，包括填充0、填充1、取反

constraints.name: subsequence_constraint
constraints.description: 查询区间内长度为k的子串中满足特定条件（VS 串）的数量
constraints.formal: count(substrings of length k in [l, r] that are VS strings)

constraints.name: longest_increasing_subsequence_constraint
constraints.description: 查询区间内最长的满足特定条件（VS 串）的子串长度
constraints.formal: max(length of VS substring in [l, r])

result.description: 求满足条件的最长子数组长度

objective.description: 求满足条件的最长子数组长度

invariants.name: interval_mergeable
invariants.description: 区间信息可通过子区间合并，适用于线段树等数据结构进行区间操作和查询

invariants.name: interval_additivity
invariants.description: 区间和可通过端点差值计算，适用于前缀和等技术处理区间性质

invariants.name: state_transition
invariants.description: 状态转移一致性，每个操作后区间的VS串性质能够通过定义的状态转移规则确定
